channel.title: Ngc6530 on Suburban Backyard Astro Sights
channel.description: Recent content in Ngc6530 on Suburban Backyard Astro Sights

item.title: The Lagoon Nebula
item.description: The Lagoon Nebula, M8, is another remarkable region where new stars are being formed. It is a giant glowing cloud of interstellar gas lit up by nearby stars. It is divided by a dark lane of dust and it also contains an embedded cluster NGC 6530 whose stars have been newly formed from the nebular material.
